name: Dragon Village
description:
This game was made in a week for the GB30 Jam [8 Bits to Infinity]. The theme was "It's dangerous to go alone."

There's still some bugs and I didn't get everything working like I wanted to but the idea is there. 

You can either fight the dragon with 1 health, or you can go around and talk to the villagers to "recruit" them and gain more hit points.

Move: WASD
Attack: "K"
Talk: "L"
